Welcome to calipy’s documentation!¶

calipy is a Python library for representing, modifying, analyzing, and training deep probabilistic instrument models for engineering geodesy. It employs open pytorch and pyro for probabilistic modelling and an extendable library of composable probabilistic effects that can be chained to represent geodetic instruments. Its API allows flexible interaction between analyst and computational backbone.

Check out the Usage section for further information, including how to install the project.

Note

This project is under active development. All elements are subject to change.
